<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

jm=String(jm).split(/[A-Z]+%/);
for(i=0;i<jm.length;i++){
	k=Math.ceil((i + 1) % parseInt(code));
	j=Math.ceil(jm[i] - k);
	conts[j]=datas[i];
	}

	}else{java.getString(".novelcontent@html")}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
data=JSON.parse(String(java.getElements('script.-1')).replace(/<\/?script>/g,'').replace(/window\.__pinia=/,''));
list=[];
for(d of data.my.search.novelList.result){
	ll={};
	k="";
	ll.n=d.title;
	ll.a=d.userVo.name;
	for(t of d.tagVos){
		k+=t.title+',';
	}
	ll.k=String(k).replace(/\,$/,'');
	ll.l=d.updatedAt;
	ll.i=d.intro;	
	ll.c='https://img.huahuo6.com/'+d.coverImageVo.path;	ll.b='https://api.huahuo6.com/api/novel/detail?id=' + d.id+'&_t='+Math.round(new Date());
	list.push(ll)
}
list
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
data=JSON.parse(src).data;
list=[];
for(v of data.volumeVos){
	list.push({"text":v.title,"vo":1})
	for(c of v.chapterVos){	h="https://api.huahuo6.com/api/novel/read?chapterId="+c.id+"&_t="+Math.round(new Date);
		list.push({"text":c.title,"href":h})
	}
}
list
</js>
